plot: Errol tries to prevent his son from marrying a South American girl by buying the girl a ring. Complications arise when Errol's wife confiscates the ring, and Errol has to impersonate a local bandit to get it back.
title: Punchy Pancho
plot_es: Errol tries to prevent his son from marrying a South American girl by buying the girl a ring. Complications arise when Errol's wife confiscates the ring, and Errol has to impersonate a local bandit to get it back.
plot_en: Errol tries to prevent his son from marrying a South American girl by buying the girl a ring. Complications arise when Errol's wife confiscates the ring, and Errol has to impersonate a local bandit to get it back.
